edu.upenn.cis.ppod.model.security
Class Party

java.lang.Object
  edu.upenn.cis.ppod.model.PersistentObject
      edu.upenn.cis.ppod.model.security.Party
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPersistentObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
PPodGroup, User
public abstract class Party
extends PersistentObject

An object with a name, wholly owned permissions, and that can belong to a group.

Author:
Sam Donnelly
